tool_description: Performs comprehensive validation of the entire database schema including consistency checks, constraint validation, and best practice compliance.

schema_name.description: Name of the schema to validate

validation_level.description: Validation strictness: basic, standard, or comprehensive

error_messages: Schema not found: The specified schema_name does not exist.
Invalid validation level: Level must be one of [basic, standard, comprehensive].
Invalid normal form: Target normal form must be one of [1NF, 2NF, 3NF, BCNF].
Malformed custom rule: One or more custom rules have invalid syntax.
Empty schema: Schema contains no entities to validate.
usage: Provide schema_name for validation. Configure validation_level, naming and normalization checks, target_normal_form, and custom_rules as needed.

validation_summary.description: Summary of validation results and overall schema health
